mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id AS paymentId, p.reservation_id AS reservationId, p.transaction_id AS transactionId, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.paid_at AS paidAt, p.amount AS amount, p.payment_method AS paymentMethod, p.status AS status, p.order_id AS orderId, p.payment_key AS paymentKey FROM payment p WHERE p.reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND p.status = 'PAID' ORDER BY p.paid_at DESC LIMIT 1
